packaging_tutorial/
├── LICENSE
├── pyproject.toml
├── README.md
├── setup.cfg
├── src/
│   └── example_package/
│       ├── __init__.py
│       └── example.py
└── tests/
touch LICENSE
touch pyproject.toml
touch setup.cfg
mkdir src/mypackage
touch src/mypackage/__init__.py
touch src/mypackage/main.py
mkdir tests
